nodes.text: The grandfather of the engineer Agias Rikton served alongside clone troopers for the Galactic Republic's army during the Clone Wars. He recounted it to Rikton during the engineer's upbringing on the planet Corulag, stating that it taught him what mattered was heart. Sometime after his grandfather died, Rikton told another engineer that went by the name Devon Lhent about his grandfather a number of weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY.
Rikton's grandfather was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
